testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Navigate to application homepage
Verify multiple interactive elements exist (search form, buttons, navigation links)
Check for proper navigation structure with BeachStay Villas branding
Verify application shows real villa listings and featured content
Confirm search functionality is present and interactive
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional BeachStay Villas platform with villa search, listings, and interactive features
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or generic content, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Homepage Content and Features Test
testCases.description: Test that homepage displays proper content and interactive elements
steps: Load the homepage at root URL
Verify hero section with beach villa background image
Check search form with location, check-in, check-out, and guests fields
Verify 'Featured Villas' section displays villa cards
Check 'Popular Beach Destinations' section
Verify navigation bar with BeachStay Villas logo and menu items
Test search form submission functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Homepage displays complete BeachStay Villas interface with functional search and villa listings

testCases.name: Villa Search and Results Test
testCases.description: Test villa search functionality and results display
steps: Enter a location in the search form (e.g., 'Santa Monica')
Select check-in and check-out dates
Set number of guests
Submit search form
Verify navigation to search results page
Check that villa cards display with images, titles, prices, and details
Test filter functionality if available
Verify villa detail page navigation from search results
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search functionality works and displays relevant villa results with proper formatting and navigation

testCases.name: User Authentication System Test
testCases.description: Test complete user authentication flow including signup and login
steps: Navigate to guest signup page
Fill out signup form with valid email, password, and display name
Submit signup form and verify success
Test login functionality with created credentials
Verify user session persistence and authenticated state
Check that protected routes are accessible after login
Test logout functionality
Verify redirect to login for protected routes when not authenticated
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete authentication flow works with proper session management and route protection

testCases.name: Villa Detail Page Functionality
testCases.description: Test villa detail page displays complete information and booking functionality
steps: Navigate to a specific villa detail page
Verify villa images, title, description, and location display
Check amenities list and villa specifications (bedrooms, bathrooms, etc.)
Verify pricing information and availability calendar
Test booking form functionality
Check host information and reviews section
Verify map integration if present
Test wishlist add/remove functionality if logged in
testCases.expectedOutcome: Villa detail page shows comprehensive villa information with functional booking and interaction elements

testCases.name: Villa Booking Process Test
testCases.description: Test complete villa booking flow from selection to confirmation
steps: Select a villa and navigate to booking page
Fill out booking form with dates and guest information
Verify pricing calculation and breakdown
Submit booking request
Check booking confirmation or pending status
Verify booking appears in user dashboard/trips
Test booking modification if available
Check email notifications or system notifications
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete booking process works with proper validation, pricing, and confirmation

testCases.name: Host Dashboard and Villa Management
testCases.description: Test host-specific features including villa management and reservations
steps: Login as a host user or signup as host
Navigate to host dashboard
Verify villa listings and management options
Test villa creation/editing functionality
Check reservation management features
Verify revenue and analytics display
Test calendar and availability management
Check messaging system for guest communications
testCases.expectedOutcome: Host dashboard provides complete villa and reservation management functionality

testCases.name: Guest Dashboard and Trip Management
testCases.description: Test guest-specific features including trip management and wishlists
steps: Login as a guest user
Navigate to guest dashboard
Verify upcoming and past trips display
Test wishlist functionality - add/remove villas
Check trip details and booking information
Test review submission for completed stays
Verify messaging system for host communications
Check profile editing functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Guest dashboard provides complete trip management and user account functionality

testCases.name: Real-time Messaging System Test
testCases.description: Test messaging functionality between guests and hosts
steps: Login as guest and navigate to messaging
Start a conversation with a host
Send messages and verify delivery
Check message thread organization
Test real-time message updates
Verify unread message indicators
Test message search and filtering if available
Check message notifications
testCases.expectedOutcome: Messaging system allows effective communication between users with real-time updates

testCases.name: Review and Rating System Test
testCases.description: Test bidirectional review system for villas and guests
steps: Complete a booking or use test booking
Submit a review for the villa with rating and text
Verify review appears on villa detail page
Test review editing functionality
Check host ability to review guests
Verify review aggregation and average ratings
Test review moderation if implemented
Check review sorting and filtering
testCases.expectedOutcome: Review system allows users to leave and manage reviews with proper display and aggregation

testCases.name: Responsive Design and Mobile Compatibility
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Test homepage on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
Verify navigation menu adapts to mobile (hamburger menu)
Check search form responsiveness
Test villa cards and listings on different screen sizes
Verify booking forms work on mobile devices
Check dashboard layouts on various viewports
Test touch interactions on mobile
Verify text readability and button sizes on small screens
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application provides good user experience across all device sizes with proper responsive design

testCases.name: Advanced Search Filters Test
testCases.description: Test search filtering and sorting functionality
steps: Navigate to search results page
Test price range filters
Apply bedroom/bathroom count filters
Test amenity filters (pool, WiFi, pet-friendly, etc.)
Apply location-based filters
Test instant book filter
Verify sorting options (price, rating, distance)
Check filter combinations work correctly
Test filter reset functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search filters work correctly and provide relevant results based on user criteria

testCases.name: Error Handling and Edge Cases
testCases.description: Test application behavior with invalid inputs and error conditions
steps: Test form validation with invalid email formats
Submit forms with missing required fields
Test booking with invalid date ranges
Try accessing non-existent villa pages
Test network error scenarios
Check behavior with expired sessions
Test invalid search parameters
Verify error messages are user-friendly and helpful
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully with appropriate user feedback and fallback behavior

testCases.name: Application Performance Test
testCases.description: Test application loading times and performance metrics
steps: Measure homepage initial load time
Test search results loading performance
Check villa detail page load times
Verify image loading and optimization
Test application with slow network conditions
Check for memory leaks during navigation
Verify smooth scrolling and animations
Test concurrent user scenarios if possible
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly and performs well under normal usage conditions

testCases.name: Web Accessibility Compliance Test
testCases.description: Test application accessibility features and compliance
steps: Test keyboard navigation throughout the application
Verify screen reader compatibility with form labels
Check color contrast ratios for text and backgrounds
Test focus indicators on interactive elements
Verify alt text for images
Check ARIA labels and roles where appropriate
Test with browser accessibility tools
Verify semantic HTML structure
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application meets basic accessibility standards and is usable by people with disabilities
